original_text: Or if anyone is holding a wooden object and strikes someone a fatal blow with it, that person is a murderer; the murderer is to be put to death.
korean_text: 만일 사람을 죽일 만한 나무 연장을 손에 들고 사람을 쳐죽이면 그는 살인한 자니 그 살인자는 반드시 죽일 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Or if anyone is holding a wooden object
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 만약 누군가 나무 물건을 들고 있다가

sentences.original_text: and strikes someone a fatal blow with it
the murderer is to be put to death
